what: Real-Time PCR Data Sets by Boggy et al. (2010)
title: Real-Time PCR Data Sets by Boggy et al. (2010)
text: boggy provides real-time PCR data set s1 Boggy et al. (2010) tidy format.

title: Real-Time PCR Data Sets by Boggy et al. (2010)
Real-Time PCR Data Sets by Boggy et al. (2010)
code: library(boggy) library(ggplot2)  s1 |>   ggplot(mapping = aes(     x = cycle,     y = fluor,     group = well,     col = format(copies, big.mark = ",", scientific = FALSE)   )) +   geom_line(linewidth = 0.2) +   geom_point(size = 0.2) +   labs(color = "Copy number")

title: Real-Time PCR Data Sets by Boggy et al. (2010)
text: Gregory J. Boggy & Peter J. Woolf. Mechanistic Model PCR Accurate Quantification Quantitative PCR Data. PLoS ONE 5:8 (2010). doi: 10.1371/journal.pone.0012355.

what: boggy: Real-Time PCR Data Sets by Boggy et al. (2010) — boggy-package
title: boggy: Real-Time PCR Data Sets by Boggy et al. (2010) — boggy-package
text: Real-time quantitative polymerase chain reaction (qPCR) data sets Boggy et al. (2008) doi:10.1371/journal.pone.0012355 . package provides dilution series one PCR target: random sequence minimizes secondary structure -target primer binding. data set six-point, ten-fold dilution series. concentration two replicates. amplification curve 40 cycles long. Original raw data file: https://journals.plos.org/plosone/article/file?type=supplementary&id=10.1371/journal.pone.0012355.s004.

title: boggy: Real-Time PCR Data Sets by Boggy et al. (2010) — boggy-package
text: Maintainer: Ramiro Magno rmagno@pattern.institute (ORCID) contributors: Pattern Institute [copyright holder, funder]

what: qPCR data set by Boggy et al. (2010) — s1
title: qPCR data set by Boggy et al. (2010) — s1
text: qPCR data set named s1 comprises six-point, ten-fold dilution series, replicated duplicates targeting amplicon designed random sequence minimizes secondary structure -target primer binding. Please read Quantitative PCR data section, qPCR assays subsection Boggy et al. (2010) details.

title: qPCR data set by Boggy et al. (2010) — s1
text: tibble 480 rows 10 variables: plate Plate identifier. data set always missing (NA). well Well identifier. dye type dye used. data set values always "SYTO 13", meaning 2 mM dsDNA dye SYTO-13 (Invitrogen, Carlsbad, CA). target Target identifier: amplicon used, random sequence dubbed "S1" original authors. sample_type Sample type (curves standards, .e. "std"). replicate Replicate identifier: either 1 2. copies Standard copy number. dilution Dilution factor. Higher number means greater dilution. cycle PCR cycle. fluor Raw fluorescence values.

title: qPCR data set by Boggy et al. (2010) — s1
qPCR data set by Boggy et al. (2010) — s1
code: s1 #> # A tibble: 480 × 10 #>    plate well  dye     target sample_type replicate  copies dilution cycle fluor #>    <fct> <chr> <fct>   <fct>  <fct>       <fct>       <int>    <int> <dbl> <dbl> #>  1 NA    D8    SYTO 13 S1     std         1             5e8        1     1 0.198 #>  2 NA    D8    SYTO 13 S1     std         1             5e8        1     2 0.197 #>  3 NA    D8    SYTO 13 S1     std         1             5e8        1     3 0.197 #>  4 NA    D8    SYTO 13 S1     std         1             5e8        1     4 0.197 #>  5 NA    D8    SYTO 13 S1     std         1             5e8        1     5 0.201 #>  6 NA    D8    SYTO 13 S1     std         1             5e8        1     6 0.207 #>  7 NA    D8    SYTO 13 S1     std         1             5e8        1     7 0.221 #>  8 NA    D8    SYTO 13 S1     std         1             5e8        1     8 0.250 #>  9 NA    D8    SYTO 13 S1     std         1             5e8        1     9 0.303 #> 10 NA    D8    SYTO 13 S1     std         1             5e8        1    10 0.400 #> # ℹ 470 more rows
